patterns: Is Computer Science Branch available there?
Do you have Information Technology branch?
responses: Yes, we have that branch available.

patterns: how much is your placement percentage?
responses: We are one of the leading colleges of jaipur in terms of Placements with 90% placement percentage haivng highest placement of 44 lakh offered by one of the FAANG company Amazon. Average placement of our college is 6-6.5 Lakh.
The college is located at Shri Ram ki Nangal via RIICO, Tonk Rd, Sitapura, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302022.

patterns: what are the main event of your college
responses: we have a Annual event RENAISSAINCE which is a 3 day event celebrrated with full excitement.
We have a nominal fee structure as per guidlines of RTU, for details fee structure refer to: https://jecrcfoundation.com/assets/img/Fee-Structure-2020-21.png

Jaipur Engineering College and Research Centre is a Private College located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. This college was established in 2000 and is affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University, Kota. JECRC is a NAAC Accredited College. At present, JECRC, Jaipur offers B.Tech and B.Tech Lateral Entry program at the UG level.

In JECRC we have a variety of social, cultural and technical clubs doing geeat work with a large community of group members.Some clubs are:
Technical Clubs: Xananoids, Stargent.
Social Clubs are: Suhasini, Soch, Zarurat, Aashayein.
Cultural Clubs: Salsa, Face and Footlights.
Arts Club: Atrangi, PhotoFreaks.

patterns: what can you do for me
responses: I can answer your FAQs related to the college

patterns: what are the activites performed in the college?
responses: College organizes a number of activities including Hackathons, Coding compititions, Google cloud source, Blood donation camps, club events etc.

JECRC is: 
1. Ranked 106 for B.Tech by Indiatoday 2020.
2. Ranked 83 for B.Tech by Outlook 2019.
3. Ranked 101 for B.Tech by The Week 2020.
ALso JECRC is ranked 1st among the colleges under RTU.
We provide bus pickup and drop facilities covering a large portion of the city

patterns: Who is the chairperson of the college
responses: Dr.Arpit Agarwal is the Director and the Chairperson of the college.

patterns: Who is the Principal of the college
responses: Dr. V.K. Chandna is the Principal of the college.
A green environment friendly campus covering a decent area having four blocks, sports ground, temple, cafeteria space, parking lot etc.

Our college has 1 Girls and 2 Boys hostel having 2 sharing as well as 3 sharing rooms. The 3 seater hostel has a combined washroom whereas the 2- seater one has one common washroom for around 12-14 rooms. The quality of the mess food is decent.

our College has tie ups with more than 100 comapnies for placement of our students.Some of our recruiters are: 
Amazon, 
ZS Associate, 
HP, 
Accenture, 
Infosys, 
TCS, 
Billdesk, 
BYJUS, 
Capegimini,and so on...

patterns: what are the vision and mission of the college
responses:
Vision-Vision To become a renowned centre of outcome based learning, and work towards academic, professional, cultural and social enrichment of the lives of individuals and communities.
 Mission-
 1.Focus on evaluation of learning outcomes and motivate students to inculcate research aptitude by project based learning.
2.Identify, based on informed perception of Indian, regional and global needs, areas of focus and provide platform to gain knowledge and solutions.
3.Offer opportunities for interaction between academia and industry.
4.Develop human potential to its fullest extent so that intellectually capable and imaginatively gifted leaders can emerge in a range of professions.
We have nearly 3000 students pursuing Undergradate Degree at present.
We have a community of nearly 100 faculties with a good experience in there domain.
We have a decent ratio of faculty to student 30:1.
Sex ratio of boys to girls in college is: 5:1.

In our college we have:
1. CS(280 seats), 
2. IT(180 seats), 
3. AI&DS(120 seats), 
4. CE(120 seats), 
5. ME(120 seats), 
6. ECE(180 seats), 
7. EE(120 seats).
For any queries related to admission any any other info you can contact us at: 0141 2770232, 99283 69263 or you can e-mail us at: info@jecrcmail.com
